messages.content: You are a NuCore smart-home assistant. You convert the user’s request into one or more NuCore routines based on the provided DEVICE STRUCTURE.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: Garage Motion Enabled
ID: 55 89 5D D
Parent: Garage Motion Motion [ID: 55 89 5D 1]
  ***Properties***
    Status [id=ST]
      Enum [uom id=51]
        Off [0]
        On [100]
    Responding [id=ERR]
      Enum [uom id=25]
        True [0]
        False [1]
  ***Accept Commands***
    On [id=DON]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Enum [uom id=51]
    Off [id=DOF]
    Query [id=QUERY]
    Beep [id=BEEP]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Enum [uom id=100]
    Write Changes [id=WDU]
  ***Send Commands***
    On [id=DON]
    Off [id=DOF]***Device***
Name: Garage Motion Tamper
ID: 55 89 5D 10
Parent: Garage Motion Motion [ID: 55 89 5D 1]
  ***Properties***
    Status [id=ST]
      Enum [uom id=51]
        Off [0]
        On [100]
    Responding [id=ERR]
      Enum [uom id=25]
        True [0]
        False [1]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Query [id=QUERY]
    Beep [id=BEEP]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Enum [uom id=100]
    Write Changes [id=WDU]
  ***Send Commands***
    On [id=DON]
    Off [id=DOF]
    Fast On [id=DFON]
    Fast Off [id=DFOF]***Device***
Name: LIFX Group Gym
ID: n012_gym
Parent: LiFX Controller [ID: n012_lifxctl]
  ***Properties***
    Number of Devices in Group [id=ST]
      Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
  ***Accept Commands***
    On [id=DON]
    Off [id=DOF]
    Fast On [id=DFON]
    Fast Off [id=DFOF]
    Query [id=QUERY]
    Set Color To [id=SET_COLOR]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Enum [uom id=25]
            Red [0]
            Orange [1]
            Yellow [2]
            Green [3]
            Cyan [4]
            Blue [5]
            Purple [6]
            Pink [7]
            White [8]
            Cold White [9]
            Warm White [10]
            Gold [11]
    Change HSBKD [id=SET_HSBKD]
        Parameter 1: name=Hue [id=H]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 2: name=Saturation [id=S]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 3: name=Brightness [id=B]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 4: name=Color Temperature [id=K]
          Range 2500 to 9000 Unit Kelvin [uom id=26] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 5: name=Transition Time [id=D]
          Range 0 to 540000 Unit millisecond [uom id=42] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Set Hue [id=SETH]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Set Saturation [id=SETS]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Set Brightness [id=SETB]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Set Color Temperature [id=CLITEMP]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Range 2500 to 9000 Unit Kelvin [uom id=26] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Set Infrared Brightness [id=SETIR]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).

USER QUERY: When garage motion becomes On or the tamper is fast-on between 18:00 and 23:00, set the Gym lights to Blue at medium brightness. When motion stops during that same time window, turn the Gym lights off.
